Room.Name: Galgorie's Pond
Room.ShortDescription: You are beneath the surface of Galgorie's Pond. Can you breath water?
Room.LongDescription: Although the water is quiet, it is also murky. You cannot see very far through it, although nearby you see small bubbles rising and strands of waving waterweeds. The bottom of the pond is littered with pieces of armor and bones. The muddy bottom makes it difficult to move.
